name: app-icon-generator
title: App Icon Generator
description: Generate app icons for ICO, iOS, iPad, and macOS from a single image file
author: HunterJi

commands.name: index
commands.title: Generate App Icons
commands.description: Create app icons for ICO, iOS, iPad, and macOS from a selected image

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
